sentence.Network_en: She blench ed before her accuser.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在(她的)指控者面前畏缩了.

sentence.Network_en: GARETH, watching, saw Magicka blench, swallow and dart hasty glances and there, as though seeking escape.
sentence.Network_cn: 盖利斯看着, 瞧见巫师开始畏缩着, 吞着口水,目光胡乱的东张西望, 像是在寻找避难之地.

sentence.Network_en: So the reform of the rural land property rights institution can not blench the hypersensitive problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这组权利束中,所有权处于核心地位,因此农村土地产权改革无法绕开这个敏感的问题.
